attributes.action: Scrap the proposed legislation for speed limiting technology from 2022
attributes.additional_details: Imagine you are driving down the road at the speed limit and another car behind is coming too fast, this means the driver in front will have no way to go faster to get away from the danger behind. Although all cars are proposed to have speed-limiting technology, there will be older cars on the road without this technology. As this is a new technology I think this technology must be tested for many more years or even decades to have them on the roads safely.
attributes.background: The UK and EU have proposed legislation to limit the speed of vehicles. This will take our freedom to break the speed limit. Technology can always be hacked which is a risk so there may be a chance of it being hacked then danger will occur. Driving over the speed limit could make people happier.
